Class GamePlayControllerTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.w10.risk_game.controllers.GamePlayControllerTest
  • class GamePlayControllerTest
extends Object
    The GamePlayControllerTest class contains unit test for various methods in the GamePlayControllerTest class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void beforeAllGameEngineTests()
      The function "beforeAllGameEngineTests" initializes a new instance of the GameEngine class and creates two Player objects with specific names and attributes.
      (package private) void testAssignCountries()
      The testAssignCountries function tests whether the assignCountries method correctly assigns countries to players in the game engine.
      (package private) void testCreatePlayer()
      The testCreatePlayer function tests the creation of players in the game engine and checks if the number of players is updated correctly.
      (package private) void testGameCompleted()
      The testGameCompleted function tests whether the game is completed by simulating a game scenario and checking if the game is over.
      (package private) void testGetNoOfPlayers()
      The testGetNoOfPlayers() function tests the getNoOfPlayers() method in the d_gamePlayController class to ensure that it returns the correct number of players.
      (package private) void testGetPlayerDetails()
      The getPlayerDetailsTest function tests if the getPlayerDetails method in the game engine returns the correct player name.
      (package private) void testRemovePlayer()
      The testRemovePlayer function tests the functionality of removing players from the game engine.
      (package private) void testShowAllPlayers()
      The testShowAllPlayers function tests the showAllPlayers method by capturing the output and comparing it to an expected output.
